text: Júlio Chaves (28 December 1944 – 10 August 2021) was a Brazilian voice actor. He was known for voice dubbing many actors in Portuguese such as Rowan Atkinson, Andy Garcia, Mel Gibson, Dustin Hoffman, Jeremy Irons, and Tommy Lee Jones. He was the Brazilian voice of Marlin in the Pixar movies Finding Nemo (2003) and its sequel, Finding Dory (2016). Chaves died from COVID-19 in Rio de Janeiro on 10 August 2021, at the age of 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Rio de Janeiro Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian voice actors
title: Júlio Chaves
